en.description: A Battle Avionics that emits a field that restricts the movement of enemy targets for a certain time and then detonates, dealing damage to all enemies within an increased range. drops from kosma taktis (earth) and gyre flak (saturn.)

ru.description: A Battle Avionics that emits a field that restricts the movement of enemy targets for a certain time and then detonates, dealing damage to all enemies within an increased range. drops from kosma taktis (earth) and gyre flak (saturn.)
